name: Pastelia Stories
description: "Pastelia Stories" is a turn-based JRPG. You will be summoned into Pastelia world, and here begins your wonderful journey. Explore big world just like you want, pick any out of 30 companions, chose one of the story lines and factions to find your way back home.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, Windows 10 Memory: 1024 MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1.2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Memory: 4196 MB RAM DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1.2 GB available space
